title: Ticket #223: GCB: Default log size if 6,400 bytes; which is silly.
description:
The log size limits in GCB are measured in bytes. The default is 6,400 bytes, expressed as "long maxsize = 6400;" at line 70 in main() of src/server/broker_master.c. A 6kB log file is silly, a more reasonable default would be at least 64,000, and probably even larger.

In all likelyhood, the goal was to match Condor's old default of 64,000 bytes (no longer the default). Tellingly src/common/log.c line 14 defaults Generic_maxlog to 64000, but this limit is never used as it's always overwritten.
